column3: @OmeGak Do [these instructions](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/init.md#mac-os-x-1) need updating after this change?
@fanquake I did verified that and it LGTM, unless you want to add the how to stop the service example (IIRC others don't have).
@promag No that's fine. Just wanted to make sure that the docs were still correct.\n\nutACK ab5bba7
